article: An increase in students applying to study economics at university is being attributed to the global economic crisis awakening a public  _  for knowledge about how the financial system  _  Applications for degree courses beginning this autumn were up by 15% this January,  according to  UCAS, the Universities and Colleges Admissions Service.
